AWESOME ❤️

**POR·CE·LAIN**
ˈpôrs(ə)lən/
noun
noun: porcelain

    a white vitrified translucent ceramic; china.
        articles made of porcelain.
        plural noun: porcelains
        articles made of porcelain collectively.
        "a collection of Chinese porcelain"
